REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2538 reute r f BC-NAPCO-<NPCO>-MANAGEME 04-09 0065

TEXT.TITLE: NAPCO <NPCO> MANAGEMENT CANNOT RAISE FUNDING
TEXT.BODY: Napco International Inc said it has suspended its plan to sell its international business to a group of that business' top managers because the group has failed to obtain satisfactory financing. The company also said it still intends to pursue a new corporate direction, and is exploring acquisition alternatives. Reuter
